item.title: How to open window in MacOS programmatically using Swift
item.description: Once I face a problem - “How can I create a normal window on Mac OS?”. Definitely it is possible to use XCode, generate new project using very modern tools and start writing events handling functions/callbacks/delegates/etc. But what if I want to do everything using code, for example last available version of Swift. And here I faced a problem cause there are no normal step-by-step guides which will explain how to do it.
